issue.title: www.pinterest.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > i paid $80 for this shit. why is there still ads? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/j6brua7dk34sc8c000ccsss0w4sgscserwspbc3etk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.4.17.18.19.20.21.22&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=1.15%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.ip=208.54.104.184&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=true&stealth.disable_windows_defender=true&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.pinterest.com%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > i paid $80 for this shit. why is there still ads? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/j6brua7dk34sc8c000ccsss0w4sgscserwspbc3etk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
